import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import * as action from "../../actions"; export default () => { const [state, useState] = useState({ id: '', productName: '', category: '', details: [{ color: '', size: '', quantity: '', }], description: '', imagePath: [] }); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { data } = useSelector(state => state.listCategory); useEffect(() => { dispatch(action.getListCategories()); }, [dispatch]) return (
